name: Bridge by Dodofox
description:
Customize the game with your own player images and audio.
2 over 1 or Standard American bidding systems.
Players talk and have unique playing styles.
Four play options:
(1) Rubber bridge scoring.
(2) Swiss Team 7 hand format.
(3) Practice mode.
(4) Chicago scoring with 4 hand rounds.
Bidding conventions: Stayman, Transfers, Michaels, Unusual No Trump, Sandwich No Trump, Jacoby 2 No Trump, Texas Transfers, Blackwood, Modified Hamilton, DocFox
